messages.content: What is comfy-image-saver used for in ComfyUI?
comfy-image-saver is used to save images with their generation metadata on ComfyUI, and it is compatible with Civitai & Prompthero geninfo auto-detection.
What file formats does comfy-image-saver support for saving images?
comfy-image-saver supports saving images in png, jpeg, and webp formats.
How can I install comfy-image-saver if I have ComfyUI-Manager?
You can search for 'Save Image with Generation Metadata' in ComfyUI-Manager and install the custom nodes directly.
How do I install comfy-image-saver if I don't have ComfyUI-Manager?
You can use the command line to navigate to the ComfyUI folder, then use git to clone the repository, install the requirements, and start or restart ComfyUI.
Does comfy-image-saver support autodetection of generation metadata?
Yes, comfy-image-saver supports autodetection of generation metadata, as shown in the provided screenshot.
